languages.text: "Иногда мне кажется, будто часть того безобразного места забралась мне под кожу и никак не исчезнет. Та, что состоит из чистого отчаяния и ненависти".
languages.translation_comment: Start of Chapter 4, about having just escaped from Commorragh.

languages.text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."
languages.translation_comment: Start of Chapter 4, about having just escaped from Commorragh.
languages.original_text: "Иногда мне кажется, будто часть того безобразного места забралась мне под кожу и никак не исчезнет. Та, что состоит из чистого отчаяния и ненависти".

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part that is made of pure despair and hatred."
"Sometimes I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part that is made of pure despair and hatred."
"Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."
"Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."
"Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."
"Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

languages.text: 「時々、あの忌まわしい場所の一部が俺の肌の下に這い込んで、決して消えないんじゃないかって思うんだ。純粋な絶望と憎悪でできた一部分がさ」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

traits.locale_text: 「時々、あの忌まわしい場所の一部が俺の肌の下に這い込んで、決して消えないんじゃないかって思うんだ。純粋な絶望と憎悪でできた一部分がさ」

languages.text: "Manchmal denke ich, irgendein Tel dieses verdammten Orts ist unter meine Haut gekrochen und geht nie wieder weg. Und dieser Teil besteht aus purer Verzweiflung und Hass."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal denke ich, irgendein Tel dieses verdammten Orts ist unter meine Haut gekrochen und geht nie wieder weg. Und dieser Teil besteht aus purer Verzweiflung und Hass."

languages.text: «A veces creo que parte de ese lugar maldito se ha introducido bajo mi piel y se niega a salir. Es una parte hecha de desesperación y odio».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

traits.locale_text: «A veces creo que parte de ese lugar maldito se ha introducido bajo mi piel y se niega a salir. Es una parte hecha de desesperación y odio».

languages.text: “有时候，我感觉那个被诅咒的地方给我打下了烙印，永远都不会消失。那些纯粹的绝望、仇恨，彻底留在了我的心里。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

traits.locale_text: “有时候，我感觉那个被诅咒的地方给我打下了烙印，永远都不会消失。那些纯粹的绝望、仇恨，彻底留在了我的心里。”

languages.text: "Bazen o lanetli yerin bir parçası sanki derimin altına sızmış ve asla çıkmayacakmış gibi hissediyorum. Çaresizlik ve nefretten oluşan bir parça..."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen o lanetli yerin bir parçası sanki derimin altına sızmış ve asla çıkmayacakmış gibi hissediyorum. Çaresizlik ve nefretten oluşan bir parça..."

languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

languages.text: « Il m'arrive parfois de penser qu'une part de cet endroit maudit s'est infiltrée sous ma peau et ne me quittera plus jamais. Une part faite de pur désespoir et de haine. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I think some part of that blasted place has crawled under my skin and won't ever go away. A part made of pure despair and hatred."

traits.locale_text: « Il m'arrive parfois de penser qu'une part de cet endroit maudit s'est infiltrée sous ma peau et ne me quittera plus jamais. Une part faite de pur désespoir et de haine. »
